sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useRef, useEffect } from "react"; import LoginForm from "./LoginForm"; export default function Account({setLogin}) { const [signUp, setSignUp] = useState(false); const [accountForm, setAccountForm] = useState(false); let popUpRef = useRef(); useEffect(() => { let handler = e => { if(!popUpRef.current.contains(e.target)) { setLogin(false); } } document.addEventListener('mousedown', handler); return () => { document.removeEventListener('mousedown', handler); } }) function handleSignUp(e) { e.preventDefault(); setAccountForm(true); console.log('submited') } return (
